backend/main.mo: Main Motoko canister defining subjects, chapters, questions, user stats, test results, authorization, and admin unlock logic with persistent storage and ID counters.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module updating stored admin passwords from an old default to a new one while preserving all persistent state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing files, components, and tests related to immediate frontend admin-mode transition after successful unlock.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten descriptions summarizing many frontend components, hooks, pages, and docs.
frontend/docs/ARCHITECTURE.md: Frontend architecture overview documenting structure, routing, and design approach.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base defining OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes and global styling tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app with NEET Practice App title.
frontend/index.ts: Type definition file describing user statistics fields for the frontend.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router and app setup handling authentication, profile loading, and global error states.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminGateC: Admin password entry UI with validation, canister connection checks, and unlockAdmin mutation triggering optimistic admin mode transition.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Provides a login/logout button using Internet Identity state and handles authentication actions and UI states.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Renders a form for entering and saving a new user's name with validation and success/error toasts.
frontend/src/components/errors/GlobalErr: Error boundary component that catches rendering errors and displays a global error screen.
Displays a styled error message with options to reload the page or navigate home.
Defines the main application layout with header, navigation, footer, and responsive mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/layout/MobilePag: Wraps page content in a responsive container with configurable max-width for mobile layouts.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on identity, refreshing dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthz.ts: Provides hooks for fetching user roles, checking admin status, and unlocking admin mode with mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth context, managing identity loading, login flow, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/usePracticeTimer.ts: Custom timer hook that tracks elapsed time with start, stop, reset, and time conversion utilities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for user profiles, chapters, questions, and related CRUD operations.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and custom OKLCH color variables for light and dark modes, plus utility classes for success colors.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Implements the admin interface for managing chapters and questions with authentication, authorization, and CRUD dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/ChapterSelectPage.tsx: Displays a list of chapters for a chosen subject and lets users navigate to practice for each chapter.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the home screen with navigation to student mode, rankings, and admin mode based on identity and admin status.
frontend/src/pages/PracticePage.tsx: Runs the question practice flow with timers, answer selection, progress tracking, and result submission.
frontend/src/pages/RankingsPage.tsx: Shows the leaderboard and user stats, handling loading states and rank formatting.
frontend/src/pages/ResultsPage.tsx: Displays a placeholder results summary with performance stats and navigation, pending backend result retrieval.
frontend/src/pages/SubjectSelectPage.tsx: Renders subject selection cards for Physics, Chemistry, and Biology, navigating to chapter selection.
frontend/src/types/practice.ts: Defines types for practice sessions and question attempts, including questions, answers, and timings.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and sessionStorage parameters, including hash-based parsing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, animations, and container settings with plugins enabled.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing app purpose, architecture, existing features, issues, and versioned state.
